projects.title: PrimeStay Properties
projects.description: PrimeStay Properties is a full-stack MERN application developed as my final-year college project. It enables users to list, browse, and manage rental properties with key features like property search and filtering, and an admin dashboard for managing listings — all built using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js.

projects.title: Scroll News
